k=2
> sort(dis, decreasing = T)

> # clustering
> db <- dbscan(water_scale, eps=2.047646, MinPts=2)
> db
dbscan Pts=15 MinPts=2 eps=2.047646
       0 1 2
border 5 0 0
seed   0 3 7
total  5 3 7
> db$cluster
 [1] 0 1 0 1 1 2 2 2 2 2 0 2 0 2 0
--> noise : 2005, 2007, 2015, 2017, 2019
